The barsom (should consist) of 13 twigs and the frāgām are two. He should tie the barsom, dispose all the implements and prepare the parāhōm. He should use for it three twigs of hōm, one piece of pomegranate and one drop of consecrated milk. He should do all these preparatives in the gāh hāwan. Later, when the rapihwin arrives, the one who wants to perform in the office of zōt should say: xšnaōϑra. ahurahe. mazdā̊. aṣ̌əm. vohū. and clean his hands with pādyāb
